subject: Running
Marathon Running
lead_paragraph: Sally Meyerhoff, who recently qualified for the 2012 Olympic trials, died on March 8 at 27 when her bike and a pickup truck collided while she was training.
snippet: Sally Meyerhoff, who recently qualified for the 2012 Olympic trials, died on March 8 at 27 when her bike and a pickup truck collided while she was training.
